title: Select elements by their type
levelDescription: Selects all elements of type A. Type refers to the type of tag, so div, p and ul are all different element types.
examples:
div selects all div elements.
p selects all p elements.
markup:
div class='table'
plate id='fancy' /
plate /
bento /
div
